title: The Return of the Jaguar in the Yucatán Peninsula
description: Thanks to Mexican conservation efforts, the jaguar is making a comeback in the Yucatán Peninsula. A traveler ventures into its habitat in the tropical jungles surrounding an ancient Maya city.
dc:creator: Charly Wilder
media:description: The number of jaguars is growing in Mexico, especially in areas of the Yucatán Peninsula.
